name: Armored Core: For Answer
description:
Armored Core: For Answer is a simulation game developed by FromSoftware. It was originally released in 2008. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Armored Core: For Answer on Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.
It was produced by Toshifumi Nabeshima. It was directed by Hidetaka Miyazaki. It was scored by Kota Hoshino.
